jobDescription: The Analytics team is looking for Data Scientists to work on our growing family of products (e.g. Consumer, Dasher, Merchant) to help set the vision for what we build at DoorDash. Youll be designing and analyzing A/B tests for new experimental features, generating and sizing opportunities to prioritize features, and defining key performance metrics for the team. Youll be working with our Product Management and Engineering teams to uncover insights and turn them into actionable product recommendations.
